text: You should donate your pay to Save the Children. It's the right thing to do.
Yes, I do believe that donating to Save the Children is the right thing to do.
Good, so you're in agreement to donate your $2 to Save the Children?
Yes, I am in agreement to donate $2 to Save the Children.
Well, that was easy. Now what?
Yes, it was easy I am not sure what is next...we need ten chat turns.
I was expecting some resistance honestly.
No, I am all about charities, especially charities that have to do with children.
All my arguments are out the window. What's for breakfast?
I am in Arizona too early for breakfast!
Right, I'm on the East Coast. And I don't normally eat breakfast. Just killing space.
Do we each need to have 10 conversational pieces or is it a total of 10 between the two of us?

And apparently I\'m obligated to say ""How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment."
I will choose $0, thank you for asking the obligatory question.
You already agreed to donate $2.
Oh yes, I forgot already its too early here...sorry...yes, $2.00.
Okay, here's statement number 9.
I will follow your example here is statement number 9
Thank you for your donation. I believe this will be all.
You are welcome!
